metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9084 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Hoteldruid before 2.3.1, a division by zero was discovered in $num_tabelle in tab_tariffe.php (aka the numtariffa1 parameter) due to the mishandling of non-numeric values, as demonstrated by the /tab_tariffe.php?anno=[YEAR]&numtariffa1=1a URI. It could allow an administrator to conduct remote denial of service (disrupting certain business functions of the product).

criterions.comment: hoteldruid package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
